attributes.action: respect everybody's right to protest and allow Islam4UK to protest in Wooton Basset.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
However we feel about the aims and actions of Islam4UK, by banning them from protesting legally undermines everything that our brave soldiers are fighting for- what is the point of democratizing other nations when our own nation's sense of democratic freedoms are slowly being eroded?  

This petition seeks to garner support not for Islam4UK but for the right to gather and protest the actions of the government in a peaceful and lawful manner.

rejection.details: Islam4UK has decided not to march through the town so your request is no longer valid.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
